Miami Shores Country Club offers a wide variety of Golf, Social, and Tennis Memberships. Memberships are available for individuals, families and corporate entities. Our memberships are designed to cater to your needs. We look forward to having you join the Miami Shores Country Club family. Please click on our links below for individual membership descriptions and rates.
No initiation fees for Golf Memberships
No bonds
No Assessments
No minimum monthly spending
Download Our Membership Brochure
2024-2025 Membership Dues Rates
Special Discounts Available for Miami Shores Village Residents

"It's Your Love..."
And what better way to celebrate the beauty of your love than with the spectacular views that the Miami Shores Country Club has to offer. Let the first day of the rest of your life together begin with saying "I do," amid the picturesque landscape and panoramic golf course views. Our outdoor setting is the ideal place for your wedding ceremony and our historic club house is transformed into a wedding paradise. From 30 to 400 guests, our professional catering and culinary staff will take care of the details so that the bride and groom can focus on what's important -- their love.
As one of the largest banquet facilities in the area, it is no wonder that Miami Shores Country Club hosts such varied events as Wedding Ceremonies and Receptions, Fashion Shows, Anniversary Celebrations, Proms, Bat/Bar Mitzvahs, Awards Banquets, Holiday Parties, Quinces, Rehearsal Dinners, Bridal and Baby Showers, Dinner Dances and Golf Tournaments. All of our Wedding Packages offer White Gloved Service, Chivari Chairs, and Floor Length Linen. For those who desire additional special touches, we offer Ice Carvings, Outdoor Settings, Custom Designed Menus, Outstanding Room Arrangements and an On- Premise Party Planner to help assure that every detail has been attended to. So whether your guest list is comprised of 5 or 500, your next event at Miami Shores Country Club promises to be a success.
For more information on our packages please click either link below...
Wedding Packages
Banquet Menus
